content: I have been sharing your satirical prose with my FB friends for about 4(?) months now Allan. Only my most savvy friends still “get it” and laugh along with me. I really think you are on the satirical sphere of fame within reach of “Doonesbury” and the late George Carlin. This piece is spot-on with regard to the gaming of America by forty-five. Each line you wrote kept me in gut-jiggling giggles. Bravo and Encore . Salud, Val
